revised_title: A Crucial Test of the Electron Ring Theory of Atoms through X- and β-Rays Scattering by Rings of Electrons
tldr: The authors develop a more complete wave theory of X- and β-rays scattering by matter, specifically focusing on electron rings in atoms. The theory predicts asymmetry in scattered radiation and a scattering coefficient that varies with the number of electrons in the ring, providing a crucial test for the electron ring theory of atoms.
